name: RomM
description: RomM game library manager with PostgreSQL backend (non-Docker).

notes.text: Warning: Setup will take a long time, easily 45+ minutes as the development environment is being initialized.
Re-run the installer to update RomM safely.

Next steps: 


1)  Review and adjust romm.env for metadata provider API keys and any optional settings. 
 2)  Grab DB/app secrets from romm.creds. 
3)  Verify service health with rc-service romm status 
4)  Browse to http://<CT-IP>:8080.
